web_snippets: “There is a whole chapter of country music that's just kind of faded away,” The Kody Norris Show's frontman once said. “I believe The Kody Norris Show has been ...
Kody Norris, who founded his band, The Kody Norris Show, more than a decade ago. Kody learned early the strong musical legacy of Johnson County, Tennessee.
Though Kody Norris has been active in bluegrass music for well over a decade, The Kody Norris Show's star has been steadily rising.
